Вы являетесь хранителем собственного музея, в который приезжают ученые и коллекционеры со всего мира.

entries.name: Holdings
entries: Великий музей, коллекции которого привлекают как монархов, так и простых людей, внушая удивление и благоговение.
Специальная команда антикваров, которые управляют вашими коллекциями и музеем, прочесывая мир в поисках реликвий, которые могли бы стать прекрасным дополнением к вашему впечатляющему набору.
Место в престижном совете академиков, которые считают вас уважаемым коллегой и помогают вам в учебе.

items.name: Skill Proficiencies
entries: {@skill Investigation}, выберите один из {@skill Arcana}, {@skill History}, {@skill Medicine}, {@skill Nature}, {@skill Religion}

items.name: Languages
entries: Выберите один стандартный и один экзотический

items.name: Equipment
entries: {@item ink (1-ounce bottle)|PHB|bottle of black ink}, перо, нож для писем, пергамент, {@item ink pen|phb}, {@item ink (1-ounce bottle)|phb|bottle of ink}, жестянка с порошком для набрасывания и 10 gp

Академики используют свое образование и знания, полученные в ходе длительных исследований, чтобы зарабатывать на жизнь и реализовывать свои жизненные амбиции. Ученые обычно ценятся выше, чем представители других профессий, поскольку их знания востребованы богатыми и влиятельными людьми. Из академиков получаются отличные исследователи, следователи и универсальные специалисты по решению проблем.

entries.name: Archivist
entries: Архивариусы занимаются записью и сохранением знаний. Архивариусы часто занимаются проверкой книг на предмет ошибок и неправды, потому что для архивариуса нет большего греха, чем запись лжи. Великие архивариусы часто становятся уважаемыми учеными, обладающими огромной властью над будущим королевства. Независимо от этого, архивариусов часто ищут другие ученые, которые сотрудничают с ними для завершения своих собственных работ в смежных областях.

entries.name: Academic References
entries: Потратив час времени и успешно выполнив проверку интеллекта среднего уровня ({@skill Investigation}), вы можете найти контакт в библиотеке, академии или месте знания. Этот контакт станет дружелюбным по отношению к вам и ответит на вопросы, касающиеся исследований.

entries.name: Rank 1 - Scribe's Assistant
entries: Вы стали ценным сотрудником библиотеки, изучив искусство сбора и хранения письменных материалов. Годы выполнения бюрократических заданий сделали вас экспертом в поиске информации по конкретным и непонятным темам.

entries.name: Holdings
entries: Рабочий стол в библиотеке, колледже или музее, имеющий доступ к общим ресурсам.
Хорошо известный текст, который, как подозревается, содержит ложь, выдуманные рассказы и ссылки.

entries.name: Progression
entries: Чтобы продвинуться в этой профессии, вы должны проверять факты и документировать обнаруженные вами ошибки в поддельных, плагиатных или ошибочных материалах.

entries.name: Rank 2 - Scribe
entries: Вам поручена почетная задача расшифровки и воссоздания текстов. Вы - создатель библиотек, регистратор истории и доверенный передатчик знаний для будущих поколений. Ваша работа как книжника заключается в том, чтобы записывать знания мира. Писцы часто отправляются в мир, чтобы найти и задокументировать информацию из первых рук.

entries.name: Holdings
entries: Офис с печатными материалами, переплетным оборудованием и специальным помощником, выполняющим за вас мелкие поручения.
Доступ к закрытым секциям библиотек и других мест коллективного знания.

entries.name: Progression
entries: Чтобы продвинуться в этой профессии, вы должны заполнить и восстановить каталог книг или свитков для пополнения библиотеки. Ваш вклад в библиотеку должен быть признан начальством достойным дополнением.

entries.name: Rank 3 - Chief Librarian
entries: Ваша преданность делу приобретения и сохранения знаний привела вас к большим высотам в академическом мире. Вы отвечаете за библиотеку, которую обслуживаете, начиная с приобретения и копирования новых текстов и заканчивая сохранением и рецензированием уже существующих. От главного библиотекаря ожидают, что он приложит все усилия, чтобы проверить содержимое своей библиотеки, желательно лично.

entries.name: Holdings
entries: Большая библиотека, содержащая тексты, собранные на протяжении веков.
Команда наемников, которые занимаются повседневной работой библиотеки, например, писцы, помощники и ученые. Кроме того, ваше имя высоко ценится в академическом мире.
Доступ ко всей библиотеке, включая запретные тома и знания, которые они содержат.

entries.name: Progression
entries: Чтобы продвинуться в этой профессии, вы должны внести беспрецедентный вклад в научный мир. Это может быть раскрытие великой истины или изобретение новой методологии.

entries.name: Rank 4 - Grand Loremaster
entries: Как Великий Магистр, вы являетесь непререкаемым региональным авторитетом во всех вопросах, касающихся учености. По этой причине вас очень почитают известные люди за ваши знания и советы. Система академических кругов обращается к вам за руководством по получению знаний и распространению просвещения.

entries.name: Holdings
entries: Вы стали главой регионального образовательного или наукоемкого учреждения, например, министерства или колледжа. Ресурсы института находятся в вашем распоряжении.
Вы имеете власть над всеми небольшими библиотеками и учебными заведениями в вашем регионе, включая доступ к их ресурсам и наемникам.

У вас есть доступ к источникам знаний, которые иначе были бы засекречены императорским приказом, королевским указом или приказом военачальника. Эти источники знаний могут включать такие секреты, как запрещенные арканные практики, истинные имена демонов и схемы могущественных артефактов.

items.name: Skill Proficiencies
entries: {@skill Medicine}, выберите один из {@skill Arcana}, {@skill History}, {@skill Investigation}, {@skill Nature}, {@skill Religion}

items.name: Languages
entries: Выберите один стандартный и один экзотический

items.name: Equipment
entries: A {@item ink (1-ounce bottle)|PHB|bottle of black ink}, перо, нож для писем, пергамент, мешок с лекарственными травами, ступка и пестик, бинты, иголка и нитки, банка с пиявками и 10 gp

Академики используют свое образование и знания, полученные в ходе длительных исследований, чтобы зарабатывать на жизнь и реализовывать свои жизненные амбиции. Ученые обычно ценятся выше, чем представители других профессий, поскольку их знания востребованы богатыми и влиятельными людьми. Из академиков получаются отличные исследователи, следователи и универсальные специалисты по решению проблем.

entries.name: Physician
entries: Ваши навыки в исцелении больных и раненых дали вам обширные знания о болезнях и средствах их лечения, основанных на последних достижениях науки.
Спокойная манера поведения в постели и природная способность к приготовлению лекарств делают вас эффективным целителем.

entries.name: Medicinal Diagnosis
entries: Если вы потратите час на изучение существа и успешно пройдете проверку мудрости среднего уровня ({@skill Medicine}), вы сможете найти точную причину болезни, травмы или смерти существа. Кроме того, вы узнаете, как вылечить болезнь, если существует не магическое лекарство. Это не относится к магическим болезням, таким как заклинание {@spell contagion} или {@disease Weeping Pox|GH}.

entries.name: Rank 1 - Surgeon's Apprentice
entries: Независимо от того, чем вы увлекаетесь - человеческим телом или болезнями, которые его поражают, - ваша неустанная преданность медицине принесла вам должность ученика хирурга. Как ученик, вы должны эффективно и результативно обслуживать пациентов назначенного вами начальника.

entries.name: Holdings
entries: Проживание рядом с медицинской клиникой, больницей или лазаретом, где вы работаете.
Копия медицинского кодекса "Причины и лечения".

entries.name: Progression
entries: Успешно выполнять различные операции и быть признанным наставником, достигшим звания хирурга-парикмахера.

entries.name: Rank 2 - Barber Surgeon
entries: Вооружившись наборами целителя и медицинской утварью, вы сможете обрабатывать раны и выполнять обычные медицинские процедуры. Однако, не имея медицинской лицензии, вы можете лечить только простых людей и военных низкого ранга.

entries.name: Holdings
entries: Грубая медицинская клиника, известная как "Chop Shop", для облегчения операций, которые вы проводите.
До полудюжины учеников, которые выполняют ваши команды, помогают вам по мере возможности и стремятся сами стать хирургами.

entries.name: Progression
entries: Чтобы продвинуться в этой профессии, вы должны получить медицинскую лицензию, доказав свое мастерство и преданность королевскому врачу.

entries.name: Rank 3 - Doctor
entries: Вы доказали свое звание среди заслуженных целителей своего региона и получили лицензию на медицинскую деятельность. Теперь вам разрешено открыть медицинскую клинику и лечить представителей высшего общества. Как доверенное лицо, вы приглашены общаться с самыми выдающимися его членами.

entries.name: Holdings
entries: Медицинская клиника, оснащенная лазаретом для ухода за пациентами с различными заболеваниями в течение длительного времени.
Медицинская лицензия, выданная королевским врачом, дающая вам право лечить людей любого происхождения.
Штат клиники состоит из полудюжины парикмахеров и команды подмастерьев.
Список пациентов - влиятельных лиц различного происхождения, которые используют вашу практику для своих медицинских нужд.

entries.name: Progression
entries: Чтобы продвинуться в этой профессии, вы должны превратить свою практику в больницу, где рядом с вами будут работать несколько хирургов и докторов-парикмахеров. Кроме того, вы должны добиться больших медицинских успехов, например, открыть лекарство от болезни или совершить прорыв в медицинской практике.

entries.name: Rank 4 - Royal Physician
entries: Вы получили покровительство монарха и звание королевского врача. Только самые почитаемые и опытные врачи получают такой титул, а также честь строить и управлять королевским госпиталем. Как королевский врач, вы являетесь привратником для тех, кто хочет стать доктором. Парикмахеры-хирурги будут ждать у вашего порога несколько дней, чтобы доказать свою преданность и, надеюсь, получить лицензию. Короли и лорды-торговцы будут путешествовать по всей стране, чтобы получить ваше лечение, и заплатят все, что угодно, лишь бы вы их вылечили.

entries.name: Holdings
entries: Королевский госпиталь с многочисленными отделениями, посвященными различным специализациям, предназначенный для высшего класса.
Опытная команда врачей всех рангов, посвятившая себя управлению Королевским госпиталем и развитию медицинской практики.
Список клиентов, состоящий из монархов, влиятельных купцов и других важных персон.

items.name: Skill Proficiencies
entries: {@skill Deception}, выберите один из {@skill History}, {@skill Insight}, {@skill Performance}, {@skill Persuasion} или {@skill Religion}

items.name: Languages
entries: Выберите один стандартный язык

items.name: Equipment
entries: Перо и {@item ink (1-ounce bottle)|PHB}, нож для писем, пергамент, изящное украшение, демонстрирующее ваш статус, медальон или булавка с изображением дома вашего покровителя, придворная одежда и 25 gp.

Аристократы - правители и носители закона, они используют свое положение на вершине социальной иерархии, чтобы заставить других отстаивать свои интересы. Аристократов боятся или уважают, из них получаются отличные переговорщики, дипломаты и интриганы.

entries.name: Courtier
entries: От знатных светских львиц до дальних членов благородных семей и доверенных слуг, придворные представляют собой членов аристократии, нанятых или приглашенных правителем, чтобы составить его двор. Придворные живут в непосредственной близости от правящего класса, чтобы помогать ему и быть частью его мира. Однако чаще всего придворных считают интриганами и манипуляторами, а не полезными помощниками. Жизнь придворного - это опасные заговоры, непростые политические союзы и случайные акты предательства, если это им выгодно.

entries.name: Political Maneuvering
entries: Потратив час на беседы с различными людьми при дворе и добившись успеха при средней проверке харизмы ({@skill Deception}), вы можете наколдовать и распространить слух или сплетню в суде или политической структуре. Выбранная вами тема, будь она правдивой или ложной, становится предметом жарких разговоров при дворе или в политической структуре, где вы распустили слух.

entries.name: Rank 1 - Chamber Keeper
entries: Вы получили титул мелкого придворного, который удовлетворяет потребности двора, выполняя мелкие обязанности, например, принося вино, или более ответственные задания, например, принимая иностранных гостей с меньшим влиянием. В качестве хранителя покоев вы являетесь незаметными глазами двора, что делает вас ценным информатором для придворных заговоров.

entries.name: Holdings
entries: Комната или жилье, предоставленное вашим покровителем в пределах его владений.
Скандальный секрет, связанный с членом вашего суда.

entries.name: Progression
entries: Получите от своего покровителя незначительное звание, отражающее вашу должность.

entries.name: Rank 2 - Court Official
entries: Вы доказали, что являетесь ценным сотрудником для своего покровителя, политических союзников и других придворных. Вас повысили до чиновника, что дает вам незначительный титул и сопутствующие ему обязанности. Эти титулы могут быть разными: кофейник, мастер охоты или любой другой титул, соответствующий вашему положению.

entries.name: Holdings
entries: Полномочия и ресурсы, связанные с вашей второстепенной должностью. Например, коффер будет контролировать финансовую документацию и, возможно, даже доступ в банк.
До полудюжины наемных слуг, которые будут помогать вам в выполнении повседневных обязанностей.

entries.name: Progression
entries: Получение от своего покровителя более высокого придворного титула, отражающего ваше положение.

entries.name: Rank 3 - Court Patrician
entries: Получив более высокий придворный титул, вы стали важным и уважаемым членом двора. Возможно, вас повысили до стюарда, виночерпия, церемониймейстера или другой должности, имеющей значительное влияние при дворе.

entries.name: Holdings
entries: Более высокий придворный титул и все сопутствующие ему привилегии. Например, церемониймейстер мог иметь личный доступ к семье своего покровителя для планирования мероприятий.
Команда слуг и младших придворных, присягнувших вам либо через власть, либо через интриги.
Частные апартаменты в поместье вашего покровителя, обеспечивающие легкий доступ ко двору и экстравагантную роскошь.
Информаторы и шпионы по всему двору, которые сообщают вам интриги и ценную информацию.

entries.name: Progression
entries: Чтобы продвинуться в этой профессии, вы должны добиться полного контроля над своим Судом, используя принуждение, обман или любые другие средства.
Кроме того, вы должны получить почетное звание.

entries.name: Rank 4 - Royal Chamberlain
entries: Вы стали самым влиятельным членом двора. Благодаря честной репутации или политическим манипуляциям вы получили почетный титул, обладающий значительной властью, например, шпиона, регента или майордома. Ваши влиятельные связи и политические союзы делают вас неофициальным лидером при дворе, возможно, обладающим большей властью в практических вопросах, чем ваш покровитель.

entries.name: Holdings
entries: Полный контроль над ресурсами двора, такими как финансы, наемники и заведения.
Инкриминирующая информация, касающаяся каждого члена суда и его возможных слабых мест.
Информаторы и шпионы по всему региону, которые снабжают вас интригами относительно вашего двора и других.

_.special: a piece of fine jewelry that displays your status
a medallion or pin displaying the house of your patron

items.name: Skill Proficiencies
entries: {@skill Insight}, выберите один из {@skill Deception}, {@skill History}, {@skill Performance}, {@skill Persuasion} или {@skill Religion}

items.name: Languages
entries: Выберите один стандартный язык

items.name: Equipment
entries: Перо и {@item ink (1-ounce bottle)|PHB}, нож для писем, пергамент, изящное украшение, отображающее ваш статус, королевская печать, позволяющая легко пересекать границы, дипломатическая одежда и 25 gp.

Аристократы - правители и носители закона, они используют свое положение на вершине социальной иерархии, чтобы заставить других отстаивать свои интересы. Аристократов боятся или уважают, из них получаются отличные переговорщики, дипломаты и интриганы.

entries.name: Envoy
entries: Посланники - это представители своих правительств или монархов за рубежом. Часто их посылают в отдаленные уголки мира, и в их обязанности входит создание новых и поддержание существующих союзов. Однако большая часть задач посланника носит реактивный характер - реагировать на угрозы знати, заключать защитные пакты во время конфликта или укреплять оборону границ. Посланники отправляются туда, где есть конфликт.

entries.name: Diplomatic Connections
entries: Потратив час времени и успешно выполнив проверку мудрости среднего уровня ({@skill Insight}), вы сможете найти союзника среди аристократии, гильдий или профессиональных служб. Этот собеседник начинает относиться к вам дружелюбно и будет отвечать на ваши вопросы, касающиеся местной знати, политики и других дел высшего общества.

entries.name: Rank 1 - Secretary
entries: Вы назначены секретарем консульства, отвечающим за организацию и помощь дипломатам, работающим в нем. Вы работаете на неблагодарной и стрессовой должности, но ваша близость к влиятельным членам общества обеспечивает вам множество связей. Вы понимаете основы налаживания связей и умеете находить союзников в далеких странах.

entries.name: Holdings
entries: Бесплатное жилье в любом консульстве, которое вы представляете или в котором работаете.
Секретное зашифрованное политическое послание, которое невозможно расшифровать.

entries.name: Progression
entries: Помощь в выполнении опасной или срочной дипломатической миссии.

entries.name: Rank 2 - Counciller
entries: Вам поручено выполнить свою первую дипломатическую миссию. Выкрасть секрет, предложить договор или подстрекать к восстанию - вас отправили в дальние уголки мира, чтобы вы отстаивали интересы своей стороны. Хотя вам пока не поручают высокопоставленных дипломатических миссий, вы все еще можете встретиться с менее значительными правителями и повлиять на их дальнейшие действия.

entries.name: Holdings
entries: Личный помощник для помощи в организации, который сопровождает вас в дипломатических поездках.
Доступ к оборудованию и информации, известной консульству.

entries.name: Progression
entries: Успешно завершите собственную дипломатическую миссию.

entries.name: Rank 3 - Ambassador
entries: Благодаря своему продвижению по службе вы заняли прочные позиции в политической сфере. Вы знакомы со многими влиятельными фигурами по всему миру и можете добиться официальной аудиенции с ними в удобное для них время. Многие хотят с вами познакомиться и заинтересованы в том, чтобы стать частью вашей обширной сети союзников. В конце концов, вы точно знаете, кто нужен для любой работы.

entries.name: Holdings
entries: Команда посланников для оказания вам помощи в вашем консульстве.
Провизия и ресурсы, отправленные вам вашим родным регионом для помощи в дипломатических миссиях.
Шифровальный кодекс, используемый для расшифровки закодированных сообщений, отправляемых в ваш домашний регион и из него.

entries.name: Progression
entries: Заключите важный договор между странами или раскройте великий шпионский заговор в своей провинции.

entries.name: Rank 4 - Grand Chancellor
entries: Вы единолично руководили переговорами, которые изменили геополитический ландшафт. Благодаря вашим усилиям были объявлены и прекращены войны. Вы объездили весь мир и установили прочные отношения с действительно влиятельными людьми. Хотя вы не являетесь монархом, монархи обращаются к вам за советом. Нет никаких сомнений в том, что вы - истинный правитель королевств.

entries.name: Holdings
entries: Доступ к документам ограниченного доступа и секретным документам.
Вы представляете своего монарха или другую абсолютную власть во внешних отношениях. Вы имеете доступ к любым ресурсам, которые предоставит вам ваш монарх, и широкие полномочия по их использованию.

_.special: a piece of fine jewelry that displays your status
a Royal Seal allowing you to pass through borders with ease

items.name: Skill Proficiencies
entries: {@skill Persuasion}, выберите один из {@skill Deception}, {@skill History}, {@skill Insight}, {@skill Performance} или {@skill Religion}

items.name: Languages
entries: Выберите один стандартный язык

items.name: Equipment
entries: Перо и {@item ink (1-ounce bottle)|PHB}, нож для писем, пергамент, изящное украшение, отображающее ваш статус, {@item signet ring|PHB} выгравированный герб вашей семьи, {@item fine clothes|PHB} и 25 gp.

Аристократы - правители и носители закона, они используют свое положение на вершине социальной иерархии, чтобы заставить других отстаивать свои интересы. Аристократов боятся или уважают, из них получаются отличные переговорщики, дипломаты и интриганы.

entries.name: Noble
entries: Дворяне - это правители голубых кровей в любом обществе, наделенные властью по праву рождения. Некоторые из них являются традиционными феодальными дворянами, другие принадлежат к возвышающимся купеческим семьям. Независимо от этого, дворяне представляют собой высший уровень власти в социальной структуре.

entries.name: Position of Privilege
entries: Потратив час на речь в свою защиту и добившись успеха при средней проверке харизмы ({@skill Persuasion}), вы можете воспользоваться своей благородной привилегией, чтобы избежать последствий таких нарушений закона, как незаконное проникновение, кража, хранение контрабанды, нападение без оружия и другие мелкие правонарушения. Вы также можете использовать эту способность, чтобы уменьшить последствия более серьезных преступлений, которые нельзя полностью игнорировать.

entries.name: Rank 1 - Disheveled Noble
entries: После некоторого упадка ваша фамилия уже почти не произносится. Возможно, семья потеряла все в войне, или игорные долги забрали ваше некогда гордое дворянское поместье. Несмотря на благородную кровь, вы - бедный дворянин, не имеющий ни власти, ни влияния в мире. Единственное, что у вас осталось, - это ваш титул, который не раз выручал вас из беды. Однако благодаря упорному труду и некоторым политическим сделкам вы можете вновь стать известным.

entries.name: Holdings
entries: Разрушенное поместье.
Благородный титул, который теперь имеет мало влияния.

entries.name: Progression
entries: Получение баронства или владений, достойных этого титула, от графа или высокопоставленного дворянина.
Кроме того, вы должны восстановить свое семейное хозяйство до респектабельного состояния.

entries.name: Rank 2 - Lord Baron
entries: Вы получили титул лорда-барона поместья. Ваше баронство небольшое, но вы возлагаете на него большие надежды. Вы начали посещать званые вечера и видите, как растет ваша репутация среди аристократии. Вы являетесь местной властью в своем баронстве, однако многое делегируете администраторам. При терпении и хороших отношениях графство может стать вашим.

entries.name: Holdings
entries: Поместье баронства, включая ресурсы и наемников.
Титул барона, дающий вам власть и подтверждающий ваш социальный статус среди других людей вашего региона.

entries.name: Progression
entries: Чтобы продвинуться в этой профессии, вы должны получить звание графа от герцога или монарха.
Вы должны построить благородное поместье, подобающее графу.

entries.name: Rank 3 - Count
entries: Ваша репутация поднялась на высокий уровень. Вы ходите по залам влиятельных поместий и слышите, как прохожие шепчут ваше имя. Вы контролируете целое графство, под вашим влиянием находится множество баронств. Вы должны представлять их при дворе по вызову и ориентироваться в политической жизни аристократии. Хотя вы обладаете значительной властью, повсюду вы встретите двуличных советников и политических вдохновителей.

entries.name: Holdings
entries: A county estate, which includes resources and hirelings.
A count's title, granting you authority and affirming your social status among other individuals of your region.

entries.name: Progression
entries: To progress in this profession, you must be made a Duke by a Monarch.
You must construct a noble estate befitting a Duke.

entries.name: Rank 4 - Duke
entries: You have been appointed as a direct vassal of your Monarch, whether a king, queen, or emperor. You are invited to the greatest balls and soirees across the land, and feasts are held in your honour. With your family name restored to glory, you hold considerable influence throughout your region and the entire world. However, with such heights comes a great distance to fall. Political enemies will go to great lengths to tarnish your name and steal your titles.

entries.name: Holdings
entries: A Duke's estate, which includes resources and hirelings.
A Duke's title, granting you authority and social status among other individuals of your region.

_.special: a piece of fine jewelry that displays your status

_.displayName: a signet ring engraved with your family crest

items.name: Skill Proficiencies
entries: {@skill Intimidation}, choose one from {@skill History}, {@skill Insight}, {@skill Medicine}, {@skill Persuasion}, {@skill Religion}

items.name: Languages
entries: Choose one standard language and one of Abyssal, Celestial, Infernal

items.name: Equipment
entries: A {@item holy symbol|PHB}, a prayer {@item book|PHB} or divine text, vestments, A set of {@item manacles|phb}, a copy of the text Sins of the Heretic, a leather strap. and 15 gp.

The Clergy represents those who devote their lives to working within religious institutions. The Clergy are respected members within the social hierarchy in regions where their religion is prominent. Clergymen make effective orators, acolytes, and religious crusaders.

entries.name: Inquisitor
entries: You are a servant of an organised branch of religious enforcers who hunt down heretics and blasphemers within your own faith, and cultists of sinister powers. Divine justice does not discriminate, and you have mercilessly punished crimes both mundane and supernatural–a task that comes with little glory. You are deadly efficient in bringing the sinful to heel. However, corruption is rife within the Inquisition itself due to the Order's power and authority, and those found guilty are likewise treated without mercy.

entries.name: Eradicate Heresy
entries: Upon spending an hour, and succeeding on a medium-DC Charisma ({@skill Intimidation}) check, you can find an informant and extract information. The informant will divulge information regarding the location of local cults, witch covens, and other enemies of the Divine.

entries.name: Rank 1 - Initiate
entries: You were taken in by the church, and after showing attributes befitting of an Inquisitor you, were trained in their ways. Gruelling mental and physical training took up your time from dawn to dusk whenever you were not completing chores.

entries.name: Holdings
entries: Free lodging at the inquisitorial chapter house, temple, or any other religious institutions that you currently serve.
You have knowledge of someone from your childhood who has since become affiliated with a witch coven, religious cult, or other enemy of the faith.

entries.name: Progression
entries: Be promoted to the rank of Inquisitor by a Chapter Master.

entries.name: Rank 2 - Inquisitor
entries: You have been appointed to the role of Inquisitor, charged with enforcing divine justice by hunting down cultists, spellcasters who have violated magical laws, and other threats. Many institutions recognise your Inquisitorial authority, and temples of the faith that you serve will grant you sanctuary, food, and useful information.

entries.name: Holdings
entries: Access to information and equipment provided by the Order, in addition to information obtained by temples of the faith.

entries.name: Progression
entries: Be promoted to Chapter Master by a Grand Theologist Inquisitor.

entries.name: Rank 3 - Chapter Master
entries: You have risen through the ranks and now oversee an Inquisitorial Chapter. Initiates and Inquisitors alike answer to you, and seek your advice in matters of executing divine justice, as well as rooting out corruption within the ranks of the faith you serve. You are still active in the field, often leading factions of Inquisitors in bringing cultist organisations and powerful spellcasters to heel.

entries.name: Holdings
entries: Access to the restricted section of the chapter library, which contains all known weaknesses of supernatural entities.
Free lodging at any religious institution or temple of the faith that you serve.
Your religious institution invests you with the authority to declare people of high standing as enemies of the faith, if you have irrefutable evidence of their crimes.

entries.name: Progression
entries: Being appointed to Grand Theologist Inquisitor by the head of your Order and a panel of ranking clergy.

entries.name: Rank 4 - Grand Theologist Inquisitor
entries: You have cultivated a reputation as a devout and accomplished Inquisitor, following the teachings of the divine, executing divine justice, and seeking divine enlightenment. You hold significant influence within and outside your Order, and Chapter Masters seek your counsel on matters of the faith and the Order's mission.

entries.name: Holdings
entries: Access to a council of Chapter Masters and other ranked clergy with whom you discuss matters of your Order.
You have the authority to dismiss and appoint chapter members to positions of power, both within the Inquisition and temples of the faith.
You have the ability to denounce those who you know (or suspect) to be enemies of the faith, dispatching Inquisitor factions to investigate and restore order.

_.special: a copy of the text Sins of the Heretic

items.name: Skill Proficiencies
entries: {@skill Persuasion}, choose one from {@skill History}, {@skill Insight}, {@skill Intimidation}, {@skill Medicine}, {@skill Religion}

items.name: Languages
entries: Choose one standard language and one of Abyssal, Celestial, Infernal

items.name: Equipment
entries: A {@item holy symbol|PHB}, a prayer {@item book|PHB} or divine text, vestments, flyers displaying propoganda, a box to stand on, and 15 gp.

The Clergy represents those who devote their lives to working within religious institutions. The Clergy are respected members within the social hierarchy in regions where their religion is prominent. Clergymen make effective orators, acolytes, and religious crusaders.

entries.name: Preacher
entries: Religions need devout orators to bring new members into the fold, or reinforce the faith of the faltering. Preachers can inspire the righteous, protect the weak, or incite dread in the unfaithful by speaking clearly and passionately about the faith they serve. These rhetoricians of the divine are not dissuaded by material wealth or hidden lore; instead, they seek good repute and new converts to their deity. Preachers recruit adherents to their religion through personal devotion and overt exhibitions of piety, charity, and charisma.

entries.name: Propogate Agenda
entries: Upon spending an hour speaking publicly, and succeeding on a medium-DC Charisma ({@skill Persuasion}) check, you can influence the thoughts and opinions of locals. This could be used to heighten the common people's fear of magic, or bring comfort and peace of mind to those who share the same faith.

entries.name: Rank 1 - Crier
entries: You have always had a natural aptitude for the spoken word, compelling others to listen and partake in your views by speaking loudly and clearly about the deity you serve.
You are often seen on busy street corners and in town squares, preaching to passers-by.

entries.name: Holdings
entries: Free lodging at your local temple of the faith or religious institution.
Knowledge of a member of the ranked clergy using unlicensed magic to perform a miracle, or committing some other transgression.

entries.name: Progression
entries: You have a small congregation of followers who come to hear your sermons each day.

entries.name: Rank 2 - Truth Speaker
entries: You have cultivated a reputation in your local town or city as a persuasive and charismatic orator, able to inspire the righteous and decry the evil. Common folk and nobility alike often stop to hear you speak, moved by your unique conviction to consider joining your religion.

entries.name: Holdings
entries: You advise a group of criers in your province on religious matters and outline the agenda for each homily.

entries.name: Progression
entries: You progress after having converted a significant number of people to your religion.

entries.name: Rank 3 - Enlightened Evangelist
entries: You have gained considerable reputation in the province where you preach, regularly recruiting new converts to your faith. Your overt exhibitions of devotion and charity combined with a natural charisma make you a well-liked figure among the common people, though the more cynical uninitiated may regard you as a heretic or a charlatan.

entries.name: Holdings
entries: A temple of the faith grants you a letter of religious immunity from Inquisitors, verifying that you are not a heretic.
You have a following of disciples who accompany you on your travels to new unenlightened provinces, further glorifying your deity and you as their disciple.

entries.name: Progression
entries: A member of your congregation observes you performing a miracle, drawing new converts to the faith.

entries.name: Rank 4 - Exalted Savior
entries: You have established your reputation as a captivating rhetorician, and people are naturally drawn to you, sometimes seemingly against their will. You may even begin to perceive yourself as a messianic figure, showing the will of your deity through conspicuous demonstrations of personal devotion and charity toward the poor. For those with spellcasting abilities, magic that is woven into such demonstrations is particularly compelling.

entries.name: Holdings
entries: A dozen or more faithful disciples that observe and convey your teachings, and thousands of followers loyal to you.
A divine mandate bestowed by your deity or seraph that elevates you above the laws of humanity.

items.name: Skill Proficiencies
entries: {@skill Religion}, choose one from {@skill History}, {@skill Insight}, {@skill Intimidation}, {@skill Medicine}, {@skill Persuasion}

items.name: Languages
entries: Choose one standard language and one of Abyssal, Celestial, Infernal

items.name: Equipment
entries: A {@item holy symbol|PHB}, a prayer {@item book|PHB} or divine text, vestments, 5 sticks of incense and an alms box, religious medallion stamped with the divine word, and 15 gp.

The Clergy represents those who devote their lives to working within religious institutions. The Clergy are respected members within the social hierarchy in regions where their religion is prominent. Clergymen make effective orators, acolytes, and religious crusaders.

entries.name: Priest
entries: Priests lead the common people in the teachings of their deities. They are the figureheads and leaders in the temples and shrines where they preach, providing guidance, atonement, and hope for the downtrodden. Priests often hold positions of considerable influence within their communities, and are treated with reverence among common folk and nobility alike.

entries.name: Religious Hierarchy
entries: Upon spending an hour proving your knowledge of the divine, and succeeding on a medium- DC Intelligence ({@skill Religion}) check, you can find a contact within the local clergy. This contact begins as friendly to you and will answer questions you have regarding religion, the clergy's agenda, and local religious matters.

entries.name: Rank 1 - Acolyte
entries: You were taken in by a modest parish, where you assist in religious services and ceremonial duties such as lighting altar candles and distributing prayer books to the congregation. The priest also educates you in religious scripture and doctrine.

entries.name: Holdings
entries: You have knowledge of a senior clergy member whose teachings undermine the faith, preying on the wayward for personal gain.
Free lodging at your local temple of the faith.

entries.name: Progression
entries: You are recommended for priesthood by a senior clergy member who has overseen your study of divine texts. You will be given a religious task that you must complete.

entries.name: Rank 2 - Priest
entries: You oversee a local parish with a substantial following, where you perform rites, sermonise on the teachings of your deity, and provide spiritual guidance to followers whose faith has waned. You use your modest influence to inspire the virtuous, uplift the downtrodden, or incite fear.

entries.name: Holdings
entries: You have a modest parish that you oversee, including humble lodgings, and regularly receive locals for confession.
You have knowledge of a wealthy noble who possesses a first edition book of scripture that the church greatly desires.

entries.name: Progression
entries: You must either expose the senior clergy member exploiting the faith for personal gain, or acquire the first edition book of scripture.

entries.name: Rank 3 - Bishop
entries: In recognition of your service to the faith, you have risen to the title of Bishop, taking up residence in your own diocese in a major city. You oversee a number of senior clergy who seek your counsel and spiritual guidance in all aspects of the divine. Bishops are elected from senior priests in their Order and retain the title for as long as they remain true to the doctrine.

entries.name: Holdings
entries: You are the steward of the largest temple of your faith in your region, and receive well-appointed lodgings nearby.
You oversee your own diocese in a major city, speaking on behalf of the faith and supervising the clergy there.

entries.name: Progression
entries: You become Cardinal in the event that a Cardinal passes away or retires, and the head of your faith appoints you in their stead due to your outstanding commitment to the faith.

entries.name: Rank 4 - Cardinal
entries: As a Cardinal, you answer directly to the head of your faith. You oversee the diocese within your province, to root out corruption and heresy from on high. Cardinals are appointed by the head of their faith, and as such have their ear in all matters of spiritual and political adjudication.

entries.name: Holdings
entries: A number of dioceses that you oversee within your province.
Free lodging at any parish or diocese that recognises your appointment, and any institution under the control of the faith.

_.special: religious medallion stamped with the divine word

Common Folk are, unsurprisingly, the most common station in life. These are the masses of people who are not distinguished by noble blood, inherited wealth, or a special calling that sets them apart.
Varying as much as the professions with which they occupy themselves, common folk are typically identified by the work they do.

Often finding themselves pawns in the machinations of those who consider themselves their betters, commoners generally look after one another in tight circles of trust. Commoners are a great background for most professions and character concepts that do not fall within another background.

entries.name: Villager
entries: You hail from a small settlement like many others, populated mainly by subsistence farmers and local craftsmen. Common villagers look out for their own, typically because few would be willing to represent them. While lesser nobility regard you with disdain, fellow commoners recognise you as one of their own, and are generous with their hospitality, provided there is enough to go around. They may request a few hours of light labor in exchange for short stays, if the host is a landholder. Commoners are also willing to share information with their peers that they would withhold from people of higher stations.

entries.name: Local Gossip
entries: Upon spending an hour speaking to other commoners, and completing a medium-DC Wisdom ({@skill Insight}) check, you can learn of rumours, political intrigue, or other gossip related to a subject of your choice. This includes jobs and information people tend to hide from the authorities.

entries.name: Rank 1 - Peasant
entries: Born to a landless farmer and his wife, you found work as a laborer on the estate of a local lord tilling fields, tending to animals, or milling grain for a meagre salary. While the work was punishing, it made you physically strong, capable of working for extended hours without fatigue.

entries.name: Holdings
entries: A shack or hovel which you call home.
A deed to a heavily indebted farmstead which has been seized until its debts are cleared. You may have acquired this deed through inheritance, gambling winnings, or some other means.

entries.name: Progression
entries: Clear the debt on your deed and restore your farmstead to operating condition.

entries.name: Rank 2 - Land Owner
entries: You oversee a modest farm that produces various crops and small goods that you sell to local businesses and at markets for a modest profit. You have cultivated your reputation as an honest distributor among your customers, and a fair boss to the hired hands who help you manage your land.

entries.name: Holdings
entries: A small farmstead, including livestock, crops, and stores suitable to the location.
Half a dozen unskilled hirelings who live and work on your farm.

entries.name: Progression
entries: Become a respected and influential member of your local village.

entries.name: Rank 3 - Council Member
entries: You have been elected to a seat on the local council, assuming a public role in the governance of your village. You and your fellow council members discuss matters of trade, infrastructure, keeping the peace, and placating the local lords. You receive complaints and resolve disputes among locals, reaching an amicable resolution where possible.

entries.name: Holdings
entries: A skilled, professional hireling assistant. They may be a lawyer, accountant, or other expert who helps you manage your affairs.
Resources allocated by the Mayor for you to complete your duties as a council member.

entries.name: Progression
entries: To be elected or appointed Mayor by a lord, council, electorate, or other means.

entries.name: Rank 4 - Mayor
entries: You have risen from humble beginnings to become the Mayor of your village, either by election or appointment. Charged as a custodian of the peace, you preside over council meetings and represent your local province at ceremonial events and in dealings with the regional government.

entries.name: Holdings
entries: You have the resources of your village council at your disposal.
A team of skilled hirelings trained in professional services who assist you in your endeavours to run your holdings.
Resources granted to you by your Monarch, such as gold, military support, and other useful assets, to maintain order within the settlement.

Often finding themselves pawns in the machinations of those who consider themselves their betters, commoners generally look after one another in tight circles of trust. Commoners are a great background for most professions and character concepts that do not fall within another background.

entries.name: Entertainer
entries: Entertainers thrive in the spotlight, relishing applause and delighting in the fanciful. Entertainers are expert performers able to enthrall, inspire, and delight their audiences with a range of artistic displays. Their poetry captivates, speaking to the depth of human emotion in portraying sadness, love, or joy. Their music likewise enlivens or stirs sorrow. Their dance steps are nimble and cheering, and their humor is often tailored to their audience, whether low-born or noble.

entries.name: Find Fandom
entries: Upon spending an hour performing and speaking to locals, and completing a medium-DC Charisma ({@condition Performance}) check, you can find a contact among the local community leaders, such as village elders, tavern owners, and other wellrespected common folk. This contact begins as friendly to you and will answer questions you have regarding life within the town, local news, and public opinion.

entries.name: Rank 1 - Stage Hand
entries: Whether you have grown up surrounded by musicians or ran off to join a band of traveling performers, you have become invaluable to a more experienced performer. You pitch in wherever needed, whether as a page turner for musicians, mopping the cages of exotic animals, or helping set up camp for the night.
Occasionally, they even allow you to join the performance.

entries.name: Holdings
entries: Lodging with an entertainers' troupe, which includes food in exchange for regular performances or carrying out menial tasks.
An anonymous letter from a loyal admirer and fan who is desperate to meet you.

entries.name: Progression
entries: The troupe leader asks you to fill in for an unreliable performer, and offers you a permanent position in the troupe, owing to your musical or other talents.

entries.name: Rank 2 - Performer
entries: You have made a name for yourself as a travelling performer, whether by yourself or as part of a troupe of other entertainers. You are easily identifiable by your colorful attire and striking appearance. Your performances stir the hearts of those who hear you.

entries.name: Holdings
entries: Access to a troupe's performing equipment and supplies, including instruments, concoctions, and other resources.
Free lodging and food at any establishment you perform in.

entries.name: Progression
entries: A travelling noble or court official observes your performance, and days later you receive a letter of invitation to perform at a court or estate.

entries.name: Rank 3 - Troupe Leader
entries: You are the leader of a troupe of traveling performers, and are responsible for securing performances in towns, cities, and noble estates. You have mastered the various components of artistic performance: poetry, dance, music, and comedy. Proprietors of establishments that you perform in compensate you and your troupe with free lodgings and food.

entries.name: Holdings
entries: A following of loyal fans, including several influential individuals.
A troupe of skilled performers who are adept in a variety of forms of entertainment.

entries.name: Progression
entries: You have been offered a large sum of money by a wealthy fan to perform for them on a semi-regular basis.

entries.name: Rank 4 - Court Troubadour
entries: You have secured a permanent position as an entertainer in a prestigious estate or court, performing for the delight of high nobility. You are considered a virtuoso in your chosen art.

entries.name: Holdings
entries: Permanent lodgings at the noble estate or court where you are employed.
A scandalous secret about the lord of the manor or a prominent courtier, which you have irrefutable evidence of.

Often finding themselves pawns in the machinations of those who consider themselves their betters, commoners generally look after one another in tight circles of trust. Commoners are a great background for most professions and character concepts that do not fall within another background.

entries.name: Merchant
entries: Merchants are the lifeblood of trade, and can be found anywhere from hawking goods in local marketplaces, to having established their own stores selling artisan wares. Merchants typically belong to a Merchant's Guild, and pay a yearly sum to register for protection by local law enforcement, though this varies by province. Merchants buy, sell, and trade wares of all sorts, knowing not just the price of everything but how to haggle that price up or down at will.

entries.name: Appraisal
entries: Upon spending an hour examining a subject, and succeeding on a medium-DC Intelligence ({@skill Investigation}) check, you can accurately appraise the value of a particular item or good such as art, or a natural resource. If you do so within a settlement, you can also find the most profitable location to sell the item or goods.

entries.name: Rank 1 - Clerk
entries: You work as a bookkeeper for a local merchant. You keep records of sales and the purchase of new inventory, balance the merchant's ledger, and make sure they are maintaining a modest profit margin. You aspire to become the proprietor of your own store selling rare and desirable items.

entries.name: Holdings
entries: A small back room in a shop, which serves as an office and doubles as your sleeping quarters.
A leather-bound ledger book containing the accounting methods of your mentor and teacher.

entries.name: Progression
entries: Acquire a loan, or save up funds, and find a suitable shop or storefront to start your own business.

entries.name: Rank 2 - Merchant
entries: You have struck out on your own to seek your fortune, opening your own shop in the marketplace. You begin to cultivate a reputation as a keen appraiser, providing fair prices to customers both buying and selling. You balance the books yourself, taking care to ensure that you do not fall into debt through risky investments.

entries.name: Holdings
entries: A quaint store or shop front, in which you sell your specialised goods.
A clerk who maintains your store and runs it on a day-to-day basis in your absence.

entries.name: Progression
entries: Own and maintain multiple successful businesses simultaneously.

entries.name: Rank 3 - Magnate
entries: You have become a business mogul, opening a chain of successful stores. You are wise or exceptionally lucky in your investments, and your risks have proven profitable, while maintaining an amicable relationship with both customers and fellow Merchants. Your fortune is more secure now that it comes from several different kinds of businesses.

entries.name: Holdings
entries: A series of successful businesses spanning multiple industries, and a network of suppliers.
A senior position in the regional Merchants Guild, including networks and guild benefits.
Teams of skilled and unskilled hirelings who work to keep the day-to-day operations of your businesses running smoothly.

entries.name: Progression
entries: Defeat your largest competitor by driving them out of business, buying them out, or merging your businesses.

entries.name: Rank 4 - Guild Chancellor
entries: You have been appointed Guild Chancellor of your Merchant's Guild. You oversee the membership of new merchants, approve regulation prices and supply, and provide protection for caravans, goods, and stockpiles for guild members under your chancellorship.

entries.name: Holdings
entries: A Trade Certificate signed by your Monarch, granting you an exclusive right to sell certain specialist goods in your area.
No other business within may trade in this commodity without your consent.
Complete control of the regional Merchant Guild you originally joined.
A trade empire containing many businesses and subsidiaries, each serving your interests.

Criminals serve and thrive off the seedy underbelly of society. While many people run afoul of the law, this background is for people who make their livelihoods entirely outside the law. Rarely respected or honoured within society, Criminals often hide their true profession from others.

entries.name: Charlatan
entries: Merchants are the lifeblood of trade, and can be found anywhere from hawking goods in local marketplaces, to having established their own stores selling artisan wares. Merchants typically belong to a Merchant's Guild, and pay a yearly sum to register for protection by local law enforcement, though this varies by province. Merchants buy, sell, and trade wares of all sorts, knowing not just the price of everything but how to haggle that price up or down at will.

entries.name: False Identity
entries: Upon spending an hour writing and talking to the right people, and succeeding on a medium-DC Charisma ({@skill Deception}) check, you can create yourself a new identity with fake identification.

entries.name: Rank 1 - Peddler
entries: You are used to lying through your teeth, telling people whatever they want to hear in order to separate them from their money. It keeps you fed and one step ahead of the law, but you'll need a way to run bigger scams if you want to make real money.

entries.name: Holdings
entries: A stash of counterfeit items that you sell and scam people with.
A secluded stoop that you use as a shelter against the elements near your place of "business".

entries.name: Progression
entries: You are recruited by a gang of Hustlers, or create your own group, to participate in more organized and larger-scale scams.

entries.name: Rank 2 - Hustle
entries: You have started to work in a group as a face man, expanding your "clientele" with more lucrative cons, such as passing off coloured glass as gemstones, or bleeding wealthy marks dry with long cons.

entries.name: Holdings
entries: A group of miscreants that assist your cons, with whom you split the spoils of your larceny.

entries.name: Progression
entries: You must acquire or create plans for a large-scale con and procure the necessary elements.

entries.name: Rank 3 - Con Artist
entries: You have become more daring in your approach, orchestrating swindles that require planning, resources, and teamwork in pursuit of a big payday. You may set your gang about duplicating famous paintings to be sold in foreign cities, for example, or forging property title deeds in order to sell a building you do not own.

entries.name: Holdings
entries: A team of charismatic swindlers and skilled forgers who can recreate items at your request with great accuracy and detail.
An unmarked warehouse in a disreputable part of town, where you can store and create forged items and oversee your operations.

entries.name: Progression
entries: Successfully executing a grand con that draws the outrage of a great noble household, religious faction, or other powerful institution. It also makes you famous among other criminals.

entries.name: Rank 4 - Mastermind
entries: You have become something of a legend within the underground. Up-and-coming swindlers approach you to learn at your feet. Whether you pass on your skills or fleece your new flock is up to you.

entries.name: Holdings
entries: Many detailed plans of cons you have devised or procured.
A network of talented individuals who work at your behest, aiding you in orchestrating your ploys.

Criminals serve and thrive off the seedy underbelly of society. While many people run afoul of the law, this background is for people who make their livelihoods entirely outside the law. Rarely respected or honoured within society, Criminals often hide their true profession from others.

entries.name: Cutthroat
entries: Some crooks lie to get what they want. Some steal it when its owner isn't looking. Then there are those who walk up to a target and explain the deal: give me what I want or bad things will happen to you. Call it "protection" or call it extortion, it is perhaps the most straightforward form of crime, favoured by the violent and the ruthless.

Most Cutthroats start out working in a preestablished gang, collecting fees and extracting payments on behalf of a boss. A small gang might be responsible for shaking down a handful of businesses, while the most powerful of crime lords may influence prominent cities or regions.

entries.name: Underground Connections
entries: Upon spending an hour asking around, and succeeding on a medium-DC Charisma ({@skill Intimidation}) check, you can prove your credibility and find a contact in a local gang, Thieves' Guild, or underground network. This contact begins as friendly to you and will assist you with matters related to their criminal endeavours.

entries.name: Rank 1 - Tough
entries: Working the impoverished regions of town, you're a criminal who will mug those who walk down the wrong alley at night, or extort unwary travelers for safe passage along a road.

entries.name: Holdings
entries: A hideout where you can seek shelter from the elements, and from local law enforcement.

entries.name: Progression
entries: Acquire a building to use as a centre of operations for your illicit activities, and a handful of other criminals willing to follow your lead.

entries.name: Rank 2 - Crew Leader
entries: Being the leader of your ragtag team comes with some nice perks. Shop owners shower you with gifts and praise in order to remain on your good side during your weekly rounds. Some will even go out of their way to source rare and valuable items that you require, if they believe doing so will earn your favor.

entries.name: Holdings
entries: A group of thugs that you command, overseeing their various ploys.
Knowledge of back alleys and slipways that allow you and your group to escape unpursued by local law enforcement.
A rundown establishment that you and your fellow henchmen operate out of.

entries.name: Progression
entries: Your group of thugs has progressed in size to exert control over an entire village or district within a city.
A sizable collection of shop owners that you can regularly exploit for "protection".

entries.name: Rank 3 - Gang Boss
entries: You are now a big fish in a small pond, often butting heads with rival gangs. Your presence is not quite strong enough to force your competition out of your territory. Whether you make a bid for control or they do, one thing is for certain: there will be blood in the streets.

entries.name: Holdings
entries: Multiple warehouses and business fronts to launder and store your spoils until a suitable buyer can be located.
A network of contacts that you use to acquire and sell illicit goods.

entries.name: Progression
entries: You must overthrow a rival crime lord, or claim the territory of all surrounding rival gangs.

entries.name: Rank 4 - Crime Lord
entries: You sit at the top of the criminal pyramid of your city or region. While there are still gangs that you don't directly control, they know to stay well clear of your territory.

entries.name: Holdings
entries: An expansive territory that you control, overseeing the criminal businesses within the city and taking a cut of their profits in exchange for protection.

entries.name: Burglar
entries: Burglars break into and steal from houses, storefronts, and warehouses, primarily operating out of major cities and ports. While thieving is a risky pursuit, the hardest part can be finding a buyer for rare and valuable items. The more unique the good, the more likely its original owner will want it returned, cutting your profit margin considerably.
Goods and valuables generally need to be sold through a fence: someone who will purchase your stolen goods, sell them to unknowing customers, and take a cut of your profits.

entries.name: Surveillance
entries: Upon spending an hour observing it, and successfully completing a medium-DC Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) check, you can map the general layout of a building. This includes the guard routes and rotation times, building entrances and exits, and the potential locations of valuables.

entries.name: Rank 1 - Snatcher
entries: Breaking into homes in the lower end of town is generally your trade. Authorities only worry about civilians with the power to cause a stir; everyone else is on their own. Locks in this end of town are easy to pick, if there is a lock at all. For the same reason, though, there is less to steal.

entries.name: Holdings
entries: A safehouse in the poor district, used to store stolen goods and serving as emergency lodgings.
You have blueprints of a grand estate including secret entrances and passageways.

entries.name: Progression
entries: You rob a well-to-do store in a reputable district, gaining notoriety and a big payday.

entries.name: Rank 2 - Burglar Specialist
entries: Working in a team, while risky, allows for heists that would be beyond the reach of any one 93 Criminal burglar, no matter how skilled. Increasingly, when someone has an ambitious crime planned and needs to assemble a team of "the best," they reach out to you.

entries.name: Holdings
entries: A team of specialist thieves who operate under your instruction to execute more ambitious heists.
A contact working inside an establishment which you plan on robbing, who provides you information on the routine of the occupants, the location of valuable items, and escape routes.

entries.name: Progression
entries: Membership in an established Thieves' Guild in a major city or town.

entries.name: Rank 3 - Heist Master
entries: Your skill as both a burglar and a leader has grown considerably over time. Whether by virtue of your own confidence or a message from the divine, you believe that you are capable of executing a major heist, with the right preparation and henchmen of course. Will it be a priceless painting you have been tasked with acquiring for a prospective buyer? A slovenly prince whose private affairs you seek to meddle in, having acquired his signet ring?

entries.name: Holdings
entries: You hold a senior position in the Thieves' Guild, instructing junior members in lockpicking, housebreaking, and evading law enforcers.
You uncover evidence of an attempted assassination on the life of a noble whose estate you robbed.

entries.name: Progression
entries: You orchestrate a large-scale heist to rob the estate of a local noble.

entries.name: Rank 4 - Prince of Thieves
entries: You have squirreled away enough gold to live comfortably for the rest of your life. However, you now steal to satiate a greater motivation through the exchange of private information, blackmail, and the acquisition of rare and powerful artifacts. After all, knowledge is power, and you've risen to a level where power is mandatory.

entries.name: Holdings
entries: Your own estate with a household of staff, acquiring and selling rare and valuable items through your own circle of thieves, fences, and buyers.

entries: a {@filter gaming set|items|source=phb|miscellaneous=mundane|type=gaming set} you are proficient with, an insignia detailing your rank within a military organization, moleskin gloves, grappling {@item net|phb}, a hip {@item flask|phb} of hard liquor and 10 gp.

Militarists either work within a formal military structure, or fight for pay on an individual basis. Militarists are often respected or feared, depending on the nature of their organisation. High-ranking Militarists are often paid handsomely, as their skills can decide battles or even wars. Lower-level Militarists make great warriors, mercenaries, and guards.
It is not unheard of for militaristic individuals to accompany adventurers on dangerous missions. These tasks are said to keep the mind sharp and skills honed, especially in times of relative peace.

entries.name: Free Sword
entries: Free Swords are commonly referred to as mercenaries, taking jobs that the local forces can't handle. Mercenaries may be the only hope of villages looking for defenders against raiders, overextended sheriffs chasing powerful fugitives, and small merchants traveling Etharis's dangerous byroads. Larger mercenary companies win wars on behalf of cities and kings. They fight for coin above all else, exacting little honor from the contracts they accept.

entries.name: Independant Contractor
entries: Upon spending an hour loitering within a town, and succeeding on a medium DC-Charisma ({@skill Intimidation}) check, your intimidating presence draws offers of employment to you. As long as you are not trying to conceal your presence, jobs befitting a Free Sword Mercenary will find you. You can find mercenary and adventuring jobs only available to Free Sword licence-holders. These jobs typically pay more than a standard contract of their type. Free Sword guilds take a 5% cut as a guild fee.

entries.name: Rank 1 - Hireling
entries: You have been trained in combat by a group of mercenaries with a Free Sword licence. After many tedious years of combat drills and shooting at straw targets, you are close to receiving your very own license.

entries.name: Holdings
entries: Lodging at any Free Sword's guild house and use of Free Sword's training grounds and facilities.
The contract for a dangerous bounty that your mentor died trying to complete.

entries.name: Progression
entries: Complete a contract with a guild member who has a Free Sword licence.

entries.name: Rank 2 - Sellsword
entries: After proving your competence and trustworthiness, you have become a guildlicensed Sellsword. You start to receive specific requests for jobs as your reputation grows.

entries.name: Holdings
entries: A Free Sword licence, which allows you to accept your own contracts as a mercenary and collect the rewards.
Access to hirelings belonging to the Free Swords guild, who you can contract for a small fee.

entries.name: Progression
entries: Lead a team successfully through several highstakes encounters during mercenary contracts.

entries.name: Rank 3 - Sword Commander
entries: You have proven your combat prowess and command of battlefield tactics. Special requests for your services are becoming more frequent, often from people or groups of higher social status. The mercenary companions who accompany you on your jobs have matured into disciplined soldiers who trust you as their commander.

entries.name: Holdings
entries: Your own private room in a guild house and a retainer who can either take care of business for you at the guild house or accompany you on your travels.
Command authority over lower ranks and the power to employ them for jobs.
Access to restricted jobs that depend on sensitive information or extraordinary risk.

entries.name: Progression
entries: Successfully complete a restricted job for a highprofile client.

entries.name: Rank 4 - Battlelord
entries: You have been elected by the members of your Free Swords guild to lead them forward to greater power and acclaim. What type of commander are you going to be? Will you lead by example and rush into the fray during combat, or retire the sword and pick up the pen?

entries.name: Holdings
entries: Command of the Free Sword's guild and its members, including managing contracts, and overseeing the training of hirelings.
A guild chapterhouse, which includes housing for you and your lieutenants as well as an extensive armoury for guild members.

_.special: an insignia deatiling your rank within a military organization

_.displayName: a hip flask of hard liquor

High-ranking Militarists are often paid handsomely, as their skills can decide battles or even wars. Lower-level Militarists make great warriors, mercenaries, and guards.
It is not unheard of for militaristic individuals to accompany adventurers on dangerous missions. These tasks are said to keep the mind sharp and skills honed, especially in times of relative peace.

entries.name: Guard
entries: Public officers of the law in cities and large settlements, Guards protect the populace from the dangers both inside and outside the walls. If it looks like guards spend their time loitering and playing cards, its because most of the time the mere presence of a guard is enough to make petty criminals move along. Guards occupy a variety of stations, ranging from lowly bar bouncers to royal men-at-arms who protect the royal family and their most prized possessions.

entries.name: Informant
entries: Upon spending an hour asking around, and succeeding on a medium-DC Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) check, you can find a contact within the local constabulary or guard hierarchy. This contact begins as friendly to you and will answer questions you have regarding local wanted criminals, law enforcement, and ongoing or previous investigations.

entries.name: Rank 1 - Town Militia
entries: You have joined the local town militia out of necessity or desire. Either way, your duties have included many sleepless nights on watch, and many tedious days spent idly standing guard.

entries.name: Holdings
entries: A bunk bed to sleep in at your stationed guardhouse.
Sensitive information relating to an unsolved murder that you have not told anyone about.

entries.name: Progression
entries: Solve a crime or uncover a major smuggling route.

entries.name: Rank 2 - Captain of the Watch
entries: Your dedication to your city has not gone unnoticed, and you have been promoted to Captain of the Watch. You now lead a small detail of guards who follow your orders.

entries.name: Holdings
entries: Access to the keys to the city gates.
A group of militia guards to train and organise as you see fit.

entries.name: Progression
entries: Catch a renowned criminal before they can escape the city, or another act worthy of a promotion.

entries.name: Rank 3 - Palace Guard
entries: You have shown initiative and critical thinking under strain in leading your guard detail, and have been suitably promoted to the rank of Palace Guard. Your loyalty is highly valued, and your discretion is even more so.
Your focus has shifted from keeping the peace to protecting the most important places and people in the city.

entries.name: Holdings
entries: Free lodging on the grounds of the palace or other place of work.
Unquestioned access to restricted areas of the city.
Permission to view the casefiles of ongoing investigations and past crimes. You can also access documents detailing guard routes and rosters.

entries.name: Progression
entries: Save a VIP from an assasination attempt, rescue a kidnapped princess, or anything of equal import to be promoted.

entries.name: Rank 4 - Lord Commander
entries: You now command the entire law enforcement system of your area, with accompanying fortresses and militia. You stand as the final authority for most executive and judicial problems in your region, making you the physical embodiment of the law. When the leaders of your city need protection or want a crime investigated, they go through you.

entries.name: Holdings
entries: Command of the entire guard hierarchy within your area, with the authority to conscript new militia and impose martial law within a region or town.
Command of a fortress within a major town or city, granting you access to weapons, defensive siege equipment, and squadrons of guards under your command.
You report directly to the highest officials, and have the ear of the monarch on matters of the city's defences.

Militarists either work within a formal military structure, or fight for pay on an individual basis. Militarists are often respected or feared, depending on the nature of their organisation. High-ranking Militarists are often paid handsomely, as their skills can decide battles or even wars. Lower-level Militarists make great warriors, mercenaries, and guards.
It is not unheard of for militaristic individuals to accompany adventurers on dangerous missions. These tasks are said to keep the mind sharp and skills honed, especially in times of relative peace.

entries.name: Soldier
entries: Getting into the army isn't the hard part, staying alive is. Every nation and culture has their own notions about what makes a good soldier, and who they look to to fill their ranks.

As a soldier, you don't just know fighting–you know war. Being a soldier involves much more than individual combat prowess. Winning a battle depends on discipline, teamwork, tactics, and a great deal of marching and logistical work that the epics rarely mention.

entries.name: Combat Drills
entries: Upon spending an hour, and succeeding on a medium-DC Strength ({@skill Athletics}) check, you can run training drills and gain an accurate estimate of the drilled humanoids' combat capabilities, as well as any equipment or fortifications they use.
You determine the most suitable strategy to improve their capabilities in the short term as well as the best way to train them for the long term.

entries.name: Rank 1 - Foot Soldier
entries: Many Foot Soldiers are conscripts. Others fight for the honour of their king and country, and still others for the steady paycheck. Regardless of your reason for joining the military, the food was usually warm and the tents kept you dry during the long nights. Your time in the military has taught you the value of the regimented early mornings and working yourself to exhaustion.

entries.name: Holdings
entries: A tent to sleep in and free food when in an encampment of your military.
A letter from a fallen enemy messenger that you either killed or found.

entries.name: Progression
entries: Distinguish yourself. Bring vital information about an enemy encampment or movement that will help win a battle or prevent a defeat. Or perform exceptionally well in battle, turning the tide or capturing an enemy banner.

entries.name: Rank 2 - Sergeant
entries: Your superiors have promoted you to the rank of Sergeant. This brings new challenges in training and commanding the new conscripts who have been assigned to you. How do you train them–on training grounds or in the wilds of Etharis? Or do you let them fend for themselves?

entries.name: Holdings
entries: Command over a small unit of Foot Soldiers.
A valet who attends to your personal needs in the field and relays important messages when required.

entries.name: Progression
entries: Maintain your troops' discipline through multiple skirmishes.

entries.name: Rank 3 - Lieutenant
entries: Several Sergeants have been placed under your command so that you can coordinate their movements in and out of battle. You maintain an air of command about you, and instill confidence in those you command. You have also proven adept with battle tactics, knowing how to read an encounter and when to deploy reserves.

entries.name: Holdings
entries: Command over a brigade of soldiers.
A command tent that serves as your headquarters for battlefield operations.

entries.name: Progression
entries: Decisively win an even battle or win a battle against the odds.

entries.name: Rank 4 - Field Marshal
entries: Your recent promotion to Field Marshal has been foreseen by many and scorned by few. You command whole armies at a time. Whether you are an artist with your masterful maneuvering of battlelines, or utterly brutal in your encounters, none can deny your efficiency in war.

entries.name: Holdings
entries: Command over the region's military.
A seat at any council meetings relevant to military matters of the kingdom.
Residence in a manor close to the training grounds in the capital city.

_.special: an insignia deatiling your rank within a military organization
letter from your family or loved one

Outlanders are people who live their lives away from civilization. Some have chosen a life of isolation, while others have been exiled from society. Outlanders are renowned for hardiness and self-sufficiency, but distrusted by most civilized people.

entries.name: Beast Hunter
entries: Hunters make their living by trapping, hunting, and killing vicious beasts. Some provide meat and furs for settlements, or for trade. The strongest may become a community's best defense against wandering monsters.. They are often as brutish as the creatures they hunt, heavily scarred from close encounters with their prey. They are proficient in setting many different traps, from simple snares to spring-loaded traps and cages. The beast hunter typically favors ranged weapons when taking down larger prey, avoiding close range where possible. Some favor stealth, lying patiently in ambush, while others revel in the thrill of the chase. Beast hunters have a natural aptitude for tracking all manner of beasts, quickly noticing signs that an animal has passed by, down to an exact time and direction of travel.

entries.name: Track Quarry
entries: Upon spending an hour examining your surroundings, and succeeding on a medium- DC Wisdom ({@skill Survival}) check, you can track the movements of creatures that have passed through the area. You can ascertain the exact time and direction a creature went, if you are familiar with the type of creature.

entries.name: Rank 1 - Tracker
entries: You have shadowed an accomplished hunter to learn their methods of setting traps, stalking prey, and following tracks. When you aren't out hunting with your mentor, you busy yourself setting snares, practicing with a bow and arrow, and learning about the creatures you hunt.

entries.name: Holdings
entries: You know where to find a Beast Hunters' Lodge that you can use in the wilderness to rest and escape danger.
You have a lead as to the location of the lair of a powerful and dangerous creature.

entries.name: Progression
entries: Prove to your mentor that you are competent to hunt on your own and teach the new and inexperienced.

entries.name: Rank 2 - Trapper
entries: You have developed your hunting skills to the point where you can make a living from them, beyond just feeding yourself day to day. You are adept in setting traps, and have an eye for where to ready your snares to maximise your chances of an easy kill. You seek out game trails where there is evidence of recent activity, and almost always return to find a creature snared in your trap.

entries.name: Holdings
entries: Up to a handful of apprentices who wish to learn the trade.
Use of equipment from a Beast Hunters' Lodge to hunt any beast you accept a contract to kill. You must have access to a Beast Hunters' Lodge.

entries.name: Progression
entries: Complete a contract to kill a particularly rare and dangerous beast for a community or an influential individual. You must determine the creature's species, track it, and slay it.

entries.name: Rank 3 - Ventaor
entries: You are the one to call in the surrounding area if farmers are being slain by beasts, or if mages require a specific magical component.

entries.name: Holdings
entries: A team of experienced hunters who assist you in large hunts and handle smaller jobs you assign to them.
Access to the Beast Hunters' Lodge's library, which contains all known weaknesses of beasts and monsters.

entries.name: Progression
entries: Slay a legendary beast. The event must draw the awe of influential individuals across the land.

entries.name: Rank 4 - Mythical Beast Hunter
entries: Your skills as a hunter are known to be unparalleled in the lands. Monarchs and nobles request your aid to remove the most difficult of monsters from their lands. Merchants contract you to capture the most vicious of mythical creatures, and druids ask for your assistance to relocate dangerous but endangered fantastical creatures.

entries.name: Holdings
entries: Control of the guild of Beast Hunters, including the resources and personnel the guild controls.
Fame and high repute across the land as a figure of legend.
A mighty weapon or artifact handed down to you by the guild, a satisfied customer, or an admirer.
An audience with any ruler at their convenience to discuss matters of beast hunting in their domain.
